thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Ramya

author: Ramya
title: Ramya
text: I ordered 15+ kids books in 'very good' condition and out of those a couple had covers colored in or names written across the front pages. Some comments to this effect would have been very helpful in my selection. I would have bought other copies that did not have these even if it cost a little more. And that would have been 5 stars. The remaining books were in great condition and great value for money!
